abstract: The reporters and editors of The New York Times are always searching for the most interesting items on the Web. On Monday, they found mourning on the Internet, robot drug agents and a study on why you remove friends from Facebook. Is it something they said?
snippet: The reporters and editors of The New York Times are always searching for the most interesting items on the Web. On Monday, they found mourning on the Internet, robot drug agents and a study on why you remove friends from Facebook. Is it something ...
lead_paragraph: Here’s what the reporters and editors of The New York Times found on the Web. For the full list, look over to the right-hand column.

headline.main: Today’s Scuttlebot: Robot Drug Agents and Mourning
